statements: UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET optimal_stock = 150, restock_threshold = 50 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = 15, optimal_stock = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET product_name = 'New Product Name', restock_threshold = 10 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 100 WHERE item_id = 1
UPDATE RestockHistory SET restock_location = 'Warehouse' WHERE restock_id = 101
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, last_restock_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE item_id = 101
UPDATE RestockHistory SET restock_location = 'Warehouse A', quantity_added = quantity_added + 10 WHERE item_id = 201
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity_in_stock = 100 WHERE item_id = 123;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 456;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock - 5, restock_threshold = 20 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_address = '123 Main St', contact_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50, last_stocked = '2022-02-15' WHERE product_id = 456 AND warehouse_id = 789;
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50, last_stocked = '2022-05-05' WHERE product_id = 456 AND warehouse_id = 789;
UPDATE InventoryItems SET price = 15.99 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', phone_number = '555-1234' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE InventoryItems SET quantity = quantity + 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE Orders SET quantity = quantity - 2, order_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE order_id = 201;
